_header: Fortune unfriendly thou art unto me
_description: Complaint against fortune — one five-line stanza

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
Fortune vnfrendly þou art vnto meMy dyligent seruise to my
                    soverayneThere I leve Fortune ȝit wyll I turne ageyneWher fortune
                    hathe fayled me with his traceMy lord to plese my tutor shal be
                    Grace
